unittitle_ssm: David C. Garre collection of Eugene G. Blackford papers
abstract_ssm: The collection is primarily composed of papers which belonged to Eugene G. Blackford, specifically regarding two organizations: the Mariners' and Wanderers' Aid Society and the Ichthyophagous Club. The papers were collected by David C. Garre.
